item.title: House speaker vote: Mike Johnson on track to fail to get majority on first ballot
item.description: Republicans, who hold a slim majority of seats in the House, twice in the past two years have struggled to reach a consensus on who should be speaker.

item.title: Stocks rise on Friday as S&P 500 looks to snap five-day losing streak: Live updates
item.description: Wall Street is coming off a choppy trading session, but Nvidia is helping push the market higher on Friday.

item.title: High-quality stocks that pay a hefty dividend they are unlikely to cut in 2025, according to UBS
item.description: With a bumpy start to 2025, quality stocks that have reliable dividends could become more appealing.

item.title: GM, Ford report best annual U.S. sales since 2019
item.description: Both General Motors and Ford Motor on Friday reported their best annual U.S. new vehicle sales since 2019.

item.title: Tesla stock is just a $900 billion 'call option' on autonomous driving, robotics, says Evercore ISI
item.description: Evercore ISI is offering up an alternative way for investors to take a look at Tesla shares.
